bodyV2.markdown:
No, that will not be a problem. The name of the attendee does not need to match the name printed on the ticket.

You can forward on your eTicket to someone else, for example you purchased tickets as a gift for someone, they will have no issues with getting in, unless it has been mentioned explicitly for a specific event.

content.name: My name is on the tickets, but someone else is going to the event. Will that be a problem?
